import math

a, b, t = map(int, input().split())

ans = math.floor(t / a) * b
print(int(ans))


a, b, t = map(int, input().split())

total_biscuits = 0
time = 0
while time <= t:
    total_biscuits += b
    time += a

print(total_biscuits)

import math

A, B, T = map(int, input().split())

print(math.floor(T/A)*B)
import math

A, B, T = map(int, input().split())

print(math.floor(T/A)*B)


# 1. Input A, B, and T
# 2. Initialize total_biscuits = 0
# 3. Initialize time = 0
# 3. While time <= T:
#     total_biscuits += B
#     time += A
# 4. Print total_biscuits

a, b, t = map(int, input().split())

total_biscuits = 0
time = 0
while time <= t:
    total_biscuits += b
    time += a

print(total_biscuits)


a, b, t = map(int, input().split())

total = 0
for i in range(t):
    if i % a == 0:
        total += b

print(total_biscuits)
